name: The Abductor From Space
description:
A endless game on abducting people in space as a alien. You can abduct people to increase your score and get coins, the coins can be used in the shop on upgrades. Try to beat your high score. 

Links:

Youtbe - Youtube Channel

Twitter - Twitter

Scratch - -Chamelian-

Not available for mobile players currently

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrows to move

Space bar to shoot beams that can abduct people

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 but because of some bugs I had to remove as it was unplayable. The problem has been fixed but the game had to be taken out of the contest.
